alerts.title: Flood Warning
alerts.description: Heavy rainfall expected with potential flooding in low-lying areas.
alerts.advice: Move to higher ground and avoid driving through flooded roads.

alerts.title: Severe Weather Alert
alerts.description: Strong winds and heavy rain expected throughout the day.
alerts.advice: Avoid unnecessary travel and secure outdoor objects.

alerts.title: Typhoon Alert
alerts.description: Typhoon approaching with strong winds and heavy rainfall expected.
alerts.advice: Stay indoors and stock up on essential supplies.

alerts.title: Landslide Warning
alerts.description: Continuous rain has increased the risk of landslides in hilly areas.
alerts.advice: Evacuate if you are in a high-risk zone.

alerts.title: Wind Advisory
alerts.description: Strong winds are expected in coastal regions, posing risks for small boats.
alerts.advice: Avoid going out on small watercrafts.

alerts.title: Heat Advisory
alerts.description: Extreme heat expected, with temperatures reaching up to 40Â°C.
alerts.advice: Stay indoors, stay hydrated, and avoid outdoor activities.

alerts.title: Monsoon Flood Alert
alerts.description: Heavy rainfall due to monsoon could cause flash floods in low-lying areas.

alerts.title: Blizzard Warning
alerts.description: Heavy snowfall and strong winds expected. Visibility will be significantly reduced.
alerts.advice: Stay indoors and avoid all travel unless necessary.

alerts.title: Air Quality Alert
alerts.description: High levels of pollution detected, air quality is unhealthy for sensitive groups.
alerts.advice: Wear masks outdoors and limit physical exertion.

alerts.title: Flash Flood Warning
alerts.description: Heavy rainfall in the area is expected to cause flash floods.
alerts.advice: Move to higher ground and avoid traveling through flooded roads.

alerts.title: Tropical Storm Warning
alerts.description: A tropical storm is approaching the region with heavy rain and strong winds.
alerts.advice: Prepare for potential flooding and stay indoors.

alerts.title: Flood Alert
alerts.description: Heavy rainfall expected in urban areas, with risks of flash flooding.
alerts.advice: Prepare for potential flooding and avoid traveling through affected areas.

alerts.title: Typhoon Signal No. 8
alerts.description: A strong typhoon is expected to make landfall, bringing heavy rain and strong winds.
alerts.advice: Stay indoors and avoid all outdoor activities.
